PORTFOLIO_SITES.SITE_DESCRIPTION: Web App that shows the location of buses in the Metropolitan Area of Buenos Aires. It allows you to select one line at a time, allowing you to see the round trip routes and the real location of the buses that correspond to that line. It obtains the information of the API of the City of Buenos Aires through a small server that is responsible for delivering the data. Front developed in NextJS and back in ExpressJS

RESUME_PARAGRAPHS.text: I work developing systems for web and mobile applications, contributing to projects from planning to continuous delivery.

I have the versatility to work on frontend and backend with various tools such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript (React, Next, Nest), Python (Django), Flutter, although I am strongly specialized in TypeScript.
In addition to writing code, I also work in DevOps intervening in continuous deliveries and deployments with Firebase and AWS.
You can contact me through email or LinkedIn.
